attributes.review: This app is the glitchiest I’ve ever seen!!!! It doesn’t work at allll!!! It brought me to scamming websites and they got my address!!! I found out they work with the dark web and it’s outrageous!!!!i felt like I was followed today because this app gave out my information to random companies without my permission!!! HORRIBLE APPPP!!!!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: Horrible app as soon as I got it I got kidnapped and roaches went everywhere, the app kept asking me if I wanted to buy clothes No you don’t have my consent. This app is trash and bad. Slow and crashes a lot. Very glitchy and not to mention it makes you summon a demon No thanks.😍
attributes.title: Disgusting had a heart attack🤮

attributes.review: It took forever to download the app and when I downloaded it it made my whole entire phone get a virus. I wasn’t able to get rid of the virus after a year. During that year I couldn’t delete the app. DON’T GET THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT A VIRUS ON YOUR ENTIRE PHONE. I had to get a new phone because the virus killed my other one. DON’T GET THIS APP
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: So when I went to download this app to support my AMAZING president, it took about an hour to download and install. Then I tried to enter the app and it kept bringing me back the home screen, this made me extremely sad. What’s the point of having an app if you can’t enter it.
attributes.title: glitchy app

attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app, it took at least 2 HOURS to download even when connected to WiFi. After getting the app, it kept shutting down and exiting at random times. Overall very very bad app and terrible design. App should be removed from App Store.
attributes.title: Very bad app!!!!

attributes.review: I will never be able to fully everything wrong with this app! I haven’t been able to search anything, or use anything! It’s completely useless! I’ll never understand why someone would actually use this app, it’s disgusting.
attributes.title: Absurd!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app then within a couple of minutes my phone crashed. took it into the apple store and they said that it downloaded multiple viruses on my phone. PLEASE do not get this app, it costs so much money to get the viruses off your phone.
attributes.title: horrible
